member.name: T:BCW.Foundation.Base.Cryptography.Hashes.MD4Hash
member.summary: Copyright (c) 2000 Oren Novotny (osn@po.cwru.edu) Permission is granted to use this code for anything. Derived from the RSA Data Security, Inc. MD4 Message-Digest Algorithm. http://www.rsasecurity.com">RSA Data Security, Inc. requires attribution for any work that is derived from the MD4 Message-Digest Algorithm; for details see http://www.roxen.com/rfc/rfc1320.html. This code is ported from Norbert Hranitzky'''s (norbert.hranitzky@mchp.siemens.de) Java version. Copyright (c) 2008 Luca Mauri (http://www.lucamauri.com) The orginal version found at http://www.derkeiler.com/Newsgroups/microsoft.public.dotnet.security/2004-08/0004.html was not working. I corrected and modified it so the current version is now calculating proper MD4 checksum. Implements the MD4 message digest algorithm in VB.Net Ronald L. Rivest, http://www.roxen.com/rfc/rfc1320.html The MD4 Message-Digest Algorithm IETF RFC-1320 (informational).

member.name: M:BCW.Foundation.Base.Cryptography.Hashes.MD4Hash.EngineReset
member.summary: Resets this object disregarding any temporary data present at the time of the invocation of this call.

member.name: M:BCW.Foundation.Base.Cryptography.Hashes.MD4Hash.EngineUpdate(System.Byte)
member.summary: Continues an MD4 message digest using the input byte

member.name: M:BCW.Foundation.Base.Cryptography.Hashes.MD4Hash.EngineUpdate(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: MD4 block update operation Continues an MD4 message digest operation by filling the buffer, transform(ing) data in 512-bit message block(s), updating the variables context and count, and leaving (buffering) the remaining bytes in buffer for the next update or finish.
member.param: start of meaningful bytes in input
count of bytes in input blcok to consider

member.name: M:BCW.Foundation.Base.Cryptography.Hashes.MD4Hash.EngineDigest
member.summary: Completes the hash computation by performing final operations such as padding. At the return of this engineDigest, the MD engine is reset.
member.returns: returns the array of bytes for the resulting hash value.

member.name: M:BCW.Foundation.Base.Cryptography.Hashes.MD4Hash.Transform(System.Byte[]@,System.Int32)
member.summary: MD4 basic transformation Transforms context based on 512 bits from input block starting from the offset'th byte.

member.name: M:BCW.Foundation.Base.Cryptography.Hashes.MD4Hash.GetByteHashFromString(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a byte hash from a string
member.returns: returns byte-array that contains the hash

member.name: M:BCW.Foundation.Base.Cryptography.Hashes.MD4Hash.GetByteHashFromBytes(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Returns a binary hash from an input byte array

member.name: M:BCW.Foundation.Base.Cryptography.Hashes.MD4Hash.GetHexHashFromBytes(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Returns a string that contains the hexadecimal hash
member.returns: returns String that contains the hex of the hash

member.name: M:BCW.Foundation.Base.Cryptography.Hashes.MD4Hash.GetByteHashFromByte(System.Byte)
member.summary: Returns a byte hash from the input byte
member.returns: returns binary hash of the input byte

member.name: M:BCW.Foundation.Base.Cryptography.Hashes.MD4Hash.GetHexHashFromByte(System.Byte)
member.summary: Returns a string that contains the hexadecimal hash
member.returns: returns String that contains the hex of the hash

member.name: M:BCW.Foundation.Base.Cryptography.Hashes.MD4Hash.GetHexHashFromString(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a string that contains the hexadecimal hash
member.returns: returns String that contains the hex of the hash

member.name: T:BCW.Foundation.Base.SystemMessaging.SystemMessageQueue
member.summary:
Public Sub New(ByVal name As String)
MessageQueue.Instance.AddSubscriber(Of CommonSystemMessage) _ (Me, AddressOf OnCommonSystemMessageArrived) End Sub
Private Sub OnCommonSystemMessageArrived(ByVal message As ISystemMessage) Console.WriteLine(message.MessageName) End Sub

member.name: M:BCW.Foundation.Base.SystemMessaging.SystemMessageQueue.AddSubscriber``1(System.Object,System.Action{BCW.Foundation.Base.SystemMessaging.Interfaces.ISystemMessage})
member.summary: Fügt den Beobachter subscriber der SystemMessage TMessage hinzu und legt die CallBack-Methode messageArrivedAction fest.

member.summary: Entfernt den Beobachter subscriber der SystemMessage TMessage.

member.summary: Wirft die SystemMessage message und ruft die CallBack-Methode der Beobachter auf.

member.summary: Liefert eine Collection der registrierten SystemMessage-Typen.
